import axios from"axios";//setAuthToken sets or deletes the common header dependent on whether the token is passed into the method.
export var setAuthToken=function setAuthToken(token){if(token){axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"]=token;}else{delete axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"];}};export var signup=function signup(userData){return axios.post("/api/users/register",userData);};export var login=function login(userData){return axios.post("/api/users/login",userData);};//back to session reducer to complete setting up the redux cycle
